page.title: 08Events in Beccles.
page.content: Throughout the year there are many different events in the town.The main ones are as follows: In the spring the Mayor's Reception and Beccles Music Festival. This involves schools and indivuals in making music and lasts for two days. In the summer there is the Beccles Art Exhibition and the Regatta and Carniva with the Carnival Procession as the highlight to this.It ends with a huge fireworks display on the Quay.Many clubs and societies hold annual events and these are looked forward to by the people of the town.Among the most popular of these are the musical events put on by the Choral Society and the Light Opera Group.Life would be boring without these events.
